This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL :user-invalid selector should respond to user action promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "SyntaxError: Failed to execute 'matches' on 'Element': ':user-invalid' is not a valid selector."
FAIL :user-invalid selector properly interacts with submit & reset buttons promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "SyntaxError: Failed to execute 'matches' on 'Element': ':user-valid' is not a valid selector."
PASS :user-error selector should not be supported
Harness: the test ran to completion.
